formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'ODBC_FETCH' =-
[Syntax] ODBC_FETCH(<result-id>)
[Synopsis] Fetch a row from a multirow query
[Description] For queries which are marked as mode=multirow, the original query returns a result-id from which results may be fetched. This function implements the actual fetch of the results.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
